Mortgage Talent Acquisition professional responsible for full cycle recruitment process, including the development and execution of search strategies supporting Arizona, Arkansas, Colorado, Kansas, Missouri, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas Mortgage division. Serving as a strategic partner, I collaborate with leaders and local managers to create and implement a recruiting strategy that results in a top-tier diverse, qualified talent pool of mid-level professional to managerial candidates, minimizing time to fill and maximizing service level to hiring managers and support business strategies.Company OverviewHeadquartered in Tulsa, OK, BOK Financial Corporation (NASDAQ: BOKF) began as an energy bank more than 100 years ago during the early-century oil boom and it continues today to be a leader in that industry. BOK Financial, now a multibillion dollar corporation, provides a wide array of banking, fiduciary and investment services through seven regionally branded banks, a mortgage group, a broker-dealer, two registered investment advisor firms and an electronic funds network.Recruiting top talent is a perennial area of focus, so while other banks were struggling and reducing their labor force the past few years, we accelerated our efforts to attract the finest talent available in all of our markets, for each line of business we offer.The result is a rare combination of nationally competitive products delivered by talented employees who are deeply committed to the community we serve and to our clients’ long term success.Our regional banks operate with a local approach to conducting business. We have experienced local executive leaders and a local advisory board of directors comprised of business experts and community leaders who know and understand our local markets:•	Bank of Albuquerque•	Bank of Arkansas•	Bank of Arizona•	Bank of Kansas City•	Bank of Oklahoma•	Bank of Texas•	Colorado State Bank and TrustContact Chris: 505.855.0845

Bank of Albuquerque – Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Santa Fe, Los Lunas and BelenSince BOK Financial’s entry into the New Mexico market in 1998, average assets have grown to over $1.6 billion. BAQ proudly serves our loyal clientele with 18 traditional located in the metropolitan area surrounding Albuquerque and 1 traditional branch located in Santa Fe. BAQ is proud to have been recognized by Albuquerque Business First as a Best Place to Work for 6 consecutive years and was voted the #1 Best Place to Work in 2014! Contact Chris: 505.855.0845

Ranked #1 in the industry by IT Services Business Report for eight consecutive years and named to FORTUNE ‘100 Best Companies to Work For’ List (#49), TEKsystems provides technical staff augmentation and direct placement services, as well as full management of outsourced projects, technical education services, and comprehensive workforce management solutions. TEKsystems is a subsidiary of Allegis Group, the largest private talent management firm in the world. Our longstanding history and industry-leading position speak to our success in providing the IT staffing solutions, IT services and talent management insight required for you to actualize ROI and sustain a truly competitive advantage in a fast-changing market.With 26 years of experience in the industry, TEKsystems deploys over 80,000 technical professionals weekly and operates in 90 offices across the U.S., Canada, and Europe.The company earns its industry-leading position by consistently providing the best technical talent to support its customers’ most critical IT initiatives. Visit TEKsystems at http://www.teksystems.com.

summary: BOK Financial (BOKF), based in Tulsa, Oklahoma, is one of the top 25 bank holding companies in the U.S. The company's stock is publicly traded on NASDAQ ticker BOKF. BOK Financial's holdings include BOKF, NA, BOK Financial Securities, Inc., Cavanal Hill Investment Management, Inc. and The Milestone Group, Inc. BOKF, NA operates the TransFund electronic funds network and seven banking divisions in eight states: Bank of Albuquerque, Bank of Arizona, Bank of Arkansas, Bank of Oklahoma, Bank of Texas, Colorado State Bank and Trust and Mobank.Our continued growth can be attributed to focusing on core objectives which include investing in top talent, maintaining diverse revenue streams and expanding our regional presence with the goal of becoming the premier financial services provider in each of our markets.  Our proven strategies create value for shareholders, clients, employees and communities.About BOK Financial MortgageThe mortgage division is an approved seller servicer for Freddie Mac, FNMA and GNMA with $18+ billion servicing portfolio. We continue to grow, and seek talented mortgage professionals who can accelerate our team’s success. About BOK Financial Mortgage Retail Channel• We operate under local brand names; Bank of Texas, Bank of Oklahoma, Bank of Arizona, etc.• We provide local branch operations in most markets.• Our loans officers self source, on average, 85% of their origination volume. • Retained servicing allows Mortgage Bankers to stay connected and find new business opportunities with customers via the Mortgage Returns system.• Tiered commission schedules to benefit top producers, with same payout plan for all loans; purchase, internal refinance or bank referralAbout BOK Financial Retail Mortgage Operations:• Includes regional operations managers, processors, closers and administration staff of BOKF Mortgage. • Supports KPI/KPM productivity standards; Origination compliance standards; productivity planning; strategic workflow
